H0.text: Disposing of pet waste in a stream is the best action to help protect water resources in Virginia.

H1.text: Rinse spilled gasoline with a hose is the best action to help protect water resources in Virginia.

H2.text: Organize a river cleanup program is the best action to help protect water resources in Virginia.

H3.text: Put hazardous waste in with house trash is the best action to help protect water resources in Virginia.
